name: DOGOS
description: DOGOS innovates the classic shmup gameplay incorporating 3D graphics, dynamic camera, and the ability to move through scenarios as if it were an open world. If you like fast-paced, thrilling videogames, then DOGOS is just for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 Bits) Processor: Core i3+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64 Bits) Processor: Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible Card DirectX: Version 11

reviews.review_text: Very fast paced, very well executed for an indie studio. As a PC only gamer I am always a bit hesitant with games that are best played with an analog stick but this is the closest thing to a PC feeling game meant for a console controller I have ever played.. It's fast, it's unforgiving and it's awesome. 5 stars all around!
